column1: 711199,Plaster Machine Operator,,"Monitor equipment operation to ensure no flaws
column3: Monitor instruments to ensure proper production conditions
column5: Mount attachments or tools onto production equipment
column7: Review blueprints or other instructions to determine operational methods or sequences
column9: Study blueprints or other instructions to determine equipment setup requirements
column11: Move products, materials or equipment between work areas
column15: Manoeuvre work pieces in equipment during production
column17: Watch equipment in operation to detect malfunctions
column27: Measure ingredients or substances to be used
column29: Notify others of equipment repair or maintenance needs
column31: Calculate specific material, equipment or labour requirements",nan
